comments.raw_text:
Steps to Reproduce
---------------------------------------
1. Go to www.nrj.com
2. France > launch webradio
3.

What should have happened:
---------------------------------------

Ability to use playback controls (stop/play/vol-/vol+/mute)


What actually happened:
----------------------------------------

Channel plays but controls don't function.

This page worked for me a couple years ago under similar conditions.  Beta testing, controls worked but buttons were from wmp plugin and not spaced like those on the site itself.  Then the audio stopped playing again; just realized a couple months back that audio was coming through again but playback controls rendered useless.
comments.text:
Steps to Reproduce
---------------------------------------
1. Go to www.nrj.com
2. France > launch webradio
3.

What should have happened:
---------------------------------------

Ability to use playback controls (stop/play/vol-/vol+/mute)


What actually happened:
----------------------------------------

Channel plays but controls don't function.

This page worked for me a couple years ago under similar conditions.  Beta testing, controls worked but buttons were from wmp plugin and not spaced like those on the site itself.  Then the audio stopped playing again; just realized a couple months back that audio was coming through again but playback controls rendered useless.
